title: Interpretation of a dream about the call to prayer: seeing and hearing the sound of the call to prayer in a dream

preview.html: The dream of the call to prayer for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether it was a dream in which I was shouting the call to prayer in the mosque, hearing the call to prayer for dawn, noon, afternoon, sunset, dinner, a woman calling out a call outside of time, with a beautiful voice in the ear of the newborn, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of the call to prayer in a dream. The call to prayer indicates rank, status, reputation, the word heard, and a wife for unmarried people. The muezzin is the good caller, the mediator, the one who arranges the marriage, the king’s messenger, his guardian, or the summoner in the army. If the call to prayer is made and that is during the months of Hajj, this may indicate the performance of the Hajj obligation. A woman called to prayer in a dream at the minaret of the mosque, a great heresy is happening in the country. The boys’ ears caught the king, especially if the call was outside the time. The call to prayer indicates supplication, justice, obedience, and goodness, and the call to prayer indicates safety and salvation from the machinations of Satan. If he sees that he reduces the call, Or he adds to it, or changes his words, for he oppresses people by the extent of addition and subtraction. The call to prayer in the wilderness or camp is a spy of thieves. On the authority of a man who came to Ibn Shirin and said: You saw that I was harmed. He said: “Hajj.” Another came to him and said: I saw that I led the prayer. He said: Your hand was cut off. They asked him: How did you distinguish them? He said: I saw for the first time a beautiful, beautiful hand, so I gave it to people to perform the Hajj obligation. And I saw the second hand, an immoral hand, and I said: Then the muezzin called, O caravan, you are thieves. If he sees that he is calling to a minaret, then he is truthful and hopes for Hajj. Whoever dreams that he gives the call to prayer and performs the iqama, then adheres to the Sunnah and dies as a heretic. Whoever hears the call to prayer in a dream in the market is the death of a person. From the people of that market. If he sees that he has increased or decreased in the call or changed his speech, then he makes people wrong by the amount of the increase or decrease. If he calls for prayer in the street, then if he is among the people of goodness, he enjoins what is right and forbids what is evil. If he is among the people of corruption, he hits the one who dreams. He calls the call to prayer against a wall, so he calls a person to peace. If the call is to a house whose people are dying, and if the call is to the Kaaba, then this indicates an innovation, and the call to prayer inside the Kaaba is not praiseworthy. Whoever calls the call to prayer on his neighbor’s roof betrays his neighbor to their family. Whoever calls for prayer among the people and they do not respond to him is one of the people of the Prophet. Darkness because of the words of God: If he sees that he is a muezzin and not a awake muezzin, he has guardianship over his voice, if the guardianship has people. He who hears the call hates, shouts at him when he hates. Professor Abu Saad said: The basis of this chapter is that if someone sees a call, it is worthy of praise if he said it in his place. And if someone who is not a family member sees him, or sees him in the wrong place, then he has gone. Whoever dreams that he is being called to prayer for fun and play drains his mind, according to the Almighty’s words: (And when you call for a prayer, take it as a joke and a game. If the call is for a house, then he calls the woman with greetings, and if the call is Forcibly, he deceives the woman. If he sees himself calling for prayer on a hill, then he will be influenced by a non-Arab country, and if the country does not have a people, then he will be influenced by a profitable trade or a craft that is dear to him. On the authority of Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, that he said: The call to prayer is a separation from the companion, according to the Almighty’s saying: ( And

He said: I saw for the first time a beautiful and handsome hand, so I gave it to the people to perform the Hajj. title: Interpretation of a dream about Nabulsi, the letter S

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Al-Nabulsi: The letter S has many connotations and interpretations, as it expresses difficult problems and interpretations. It also expresses the challenges that the dreamer discovers in order to reach pleasure and stability after many difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about soap: The letter S on soap is evidence of the abundance of money and livelihood for the dreamer. To dream of a bar of soap is a sign On kindness and benefit to the dreamer. Seeing washing clothes with soap indicates a speedy recovery from illness or strength of faith. Interpretation of seeing newspapers in a dream: Dreaming with the letter “S” indicates good skin for the dreamer, and also indicates the presence of good people or friends who seek to make the dreamer’s life good. Interpretation Dreaming of breasts: The letter S in the chest is a sign of freedom from sins and repentance from them. The chest is also evidence of hiding secrets. Dreaming of breasts is an indication of the wife or a certain situation, and seeing firm breasts in a dream indicates problems and misfortunes such as losing money or the presence of a dispute between spouses. Seeing The letter “S” and pain in the chest indicate the problems that the dreamer faces due to committing sins. The presence of breasts on a man’s chest is evidence of his marriage soon. Interpretation of fasting in a dream. The letter “S” in the word fasting is a sign of the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires, and the dream of breaking the fast is evidence of the dreamer’s illness. Dream Iftar in Ramadan intentionally indicates that the dreamer killed a person. Seeing the letter S in the word fasting in a dream is a sign of recovery from illness and freedom from troubles and misfortunes. Dreaming of the letter R on a cockroach. Seeing many cockroaches in a dream indicates many problems and troubles in that person’s life. Dreaming of many cockroaches is a sign that there are many enemies in the dreamer’s life and causing him problems. A merchant who sees a large cockroach in his dream indicates the exploitation of his business and the loss of his money. A single woman who dreams of cockroaches walking on her bed indicates envy or magic in her life. A married man who sees colored cockroaches in a dream is a sign of many family problems and instability between spouses. Interpretation of the letter S in a dream: Seeing deafness in a dream indicates the unfairness of the dreamer’s religion. The letter “S” indicates the distance from right to right and also indicates lack of Comfort and exhaustion. If a young child is beautiful in a dream, this is a sign of happy news. Dreaming of a boy shows strength and pride. Forgiveness in a dream indicates blame and humiliation. To dream of screaming is evidence of assuming leadership and responsibility or getting rid of injustice. Seeing a yellow face in a dream It indicates illness and is also a sign of weakness. It also shows the presence of envy in the dreamer’s life. Dreaming of seeing our master Saleh in a dream indicates the injustice and oppression that befalls the dreamer by some fools. Seeing the letter S in a vision of our master Saleh, peace be upon him, is a sign of victory over enemies and conspiracies. Seeing charity In a dream, dreaming of giving charity is evidence of a lot of kindness and sustenance for the dreamer. Zakat in secret is evidence of repentance and repentance from the sins of the dreamer. An unmarried woman who was given charity in a dream is evidence that her dreams and desires will come true.

title: Escaping from a tiger in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tiger running in a dream for a single girl: Seeing a tiger running away from an unmarried woman shows her ability to get rid of the problems she sees. And if he manages to escape from the tiger in the dream, this indicates that he will face bad circumstances. And the unmarried woman who sees that she is running away from the tiger to... A beautiful place is a sign of achieving the goal you want. Al-Nabulsi said that seeing a tiger escaping in a dream indicates a high position in society. And seeing unmarried women running away from a tiger in a dream is a sign of something bad that you are going through. Seeing an unmarried woman In a dream, you are trying to escape from a tiger, it portends good things. If an unmarried woman tries to stay away from a tiger, this indicates that she is trying to end her life. An unmarried woman who managed to escape from a tiger without seeing it is a sign of her success in her future. See also: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin to see a tiger in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a tiger running away in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself running away from a tiger in a dream, this means that she will overcome difficulties in her life. And if she sees a tiger and runs away, this is an indication of her great responsibilities that concern her. A married woman who sees a tiger but does not If she is able to escape from it, it indicates that she is in trouble. The dreamer who looks at the tiger, becomes afraid, and runs away, is an indication of her success in getting rid of bad things. Ibn Sirin said that seeing a tiger running away indicates something bad that a married woman will be freed from. Al-Sadiq confirmed that escaping from a tiger in The dream indicates a great overcoming of problems. It explains that seeing a married woman escaping from a tiger indicates her success in her married life. If he is trying to escape from the tiger, this means that he is staying away from all worries and problems. Interpretation of seeing escaping from a tiger in a dream for a divorced woman: Seeing a divorced woman escaping From the tiger, it shows that she is free from a very difficult situation that she is currently experiencing. The divorced woman who is trying to stay away from the tiger indicates her distance from the crises in her life. If she sees that she is running away from the tiger and is not afraid, this is a sign of achieving her big goals. And the divorced woman who is looking for the tiger to escape from it suggests Overcoming problems in her life. If the tiger is left in a new place, this means that he will soon be employed in a place he wants. Seeing the final escape from the tiger shows her high ability to deal with circumstances. If she escapes from the tiger with great fear, this indicates that her mind is occupied with anxiety A divorced woman who sees a man running away from a tiger is a sign of self-fulfillment and her goals in life. Interpretation of seeing a tiger running in a dream for a man and its meaning. A man’s vision of a tiger chasing him and running away from it indicates a health problem that he is exposed to. It explains that running away from a tiger in a dream is a sign that The man will get rid of problems in his life. If he is looking for the tiger to escape from it, this indicates the achievement of his goals and dreams in life. The dreamer who sees that he is running from a tiger to a new place is a sign of action. If he leaves the tiger in a far place, this means that he will travel to abroad in the coming period

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about engagement by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about engagement, which may involve many people and they may feel happy or sad in the dream, or the dreamer may be single in reality or married, and the fiancée in the dream may be known or unknown. The psychological and social condition of the person and the circumstances and events that he experiences in his life affect the interpretation. Interpretation of the dream of engagement: The interpretation of the dream of engagement indicates blessed and good things, and is evidence that the dreamer is one of the optimistic personalities in life and wants change for the better. He knew it or not, but he was happy. The dream indicates that he will soon achieve something he wants, and that he will be happy with it, and God knows best. For someone to see in a dream that his fiancée is very beautiful, this indicates that in reality he will be engaged to a beautiful girl of the same degree of beauty that he saw in the dream, and in general, engagement. In the dream, there is evidence that the dreamer has a wish that he has been dreaming of all his life and that he will finally be able to achieve it with the grace and grace of God Almighty, and he will feel happy and satisfied, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about engagement with Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about engagement is a sign of good news if the dreamer deals with reality. The dream brings him satisfaction, happiness, self-care, and the removal of despair and illusion, as well as improving material and psychological conditions. This is about the occurrence of an occasion in which this relative is happy, and in which the dreamer participates, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about engagement with a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for an unmarried woman is evidence that her life will change for the better. The engagement of an unmarried woman in a dream is a sign of her engagement with reality by a good man with authority, especially if she sees in a dream that she is engaged on Friday, but if she dreams that she is attending a friend’s engagement and she is already engaged, this indicates that her friend’s fiancé is not suitable for her. And it is not. We are happy with him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of a dream about engagement with a married womanInterpretation of a dream about engagement with a married woman is evidence of the blessing and goodness that God Almighty bestows upon her with them as soon as possible at work, if he is an employee or in her marriage, and perhaps engagement. To a married man in her dream for a woman is interpreted by the fact that her husband’s family embraces her and carries feelings of compassion and affection for her, as the dream shows that they are a stable family, but if the lady dreams that there is someone who wants that. She marries her and is surprised by that because she knows that she is married, and the dream shows a lot of good things that will appear to her soon. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a pregnant womanInterpretation of a dream about engagement for a pregnant woman is evidence of happiness, happiness, and easy childbirth. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is engaged, a relative is engaged, or she attends someone’s engagement What, the dream was a sign that her birth date is close and it will be easy and her child will live safe and sound, thanks to God and His grace. In fact, the dreamer will feel psychological comfort after worrying about childbirth, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for a divorced woman is evidence of a change in her situation for the better and that she will achieve the things she wants, whether in her or her life.

title: Interpretation of the death of a living person in a dream for married people, single people, pregnant women, and different situations

preview.html: We met in the following article about the interpretation of the death of a living person in a dream, which we present to you in the Encyclopedia. This vision is one of the visions that often disturbs a pregnant woman, especially if the person who died in the dream was one of the people close to the dreamer and dear to his heart, so he is awake there as well. He wants a fist in his heart to speed up learning the interpretation of the dream, and he prays to God to be righteous. And know that death in a dream, whether the one who died in it is the seer, or he saw someone other than the dead, does not necessarily mean harming someone or his evil. Sometimes according to the condition in which he saw the dream, whose interpretations we will explain in the following paragraphs. Interpretation of the death of a living person in a dream We mention in the following paragraph the interpretation of seeing the death of a living person in a dream, according to Imam Ibn Sirin: Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing death in a dream is something that should not be underestimated and should be taken into account, because it may convey to the dreamer a warning message from God that he must recalculate his relationship with the Creator of himself and with him. The work he does and his relationship with those around him, and if he sees someone he knows dying, he dreams of warning him of the need to be careful in his actions and in the religious and worldly decisions he makes. Seeing a living person dying naked in a dream has two interpretations, one of which is good and the other is the opposite. The death of a living person naked in a dream can symbolize that God Almighty will forgive him the sins he committed in his life for his repentance and righteousness of his work.. In poverty, debt and need, and God knows best. Seeing the death of the living in a dream and then returning to life again indicates that he will commit some sins and disobedience, but he will hasten to repent and stop this work. As for if the dreamer sees that he has died, it is good news of longevity, good health and abundant livelihood, and God knows best. In the death of the living in a dream, he was exposed in a dream to many situations that led to his death, such as beating and war, that he will die for the sake of God and defending his religion, honor or religion. Money and his homeland. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person Seeing the death of a person in a dream between him and the fortune teller indicates conflict and hostility, indicating that this conflict will end and the relationship between them will change to friendship and love by God’s command. This dream sometimes symbolizes recovery from illness for a sick person, and it may also be good news for couples to have a child soon, especially for those who suffer from delayed childbearing, whether the dreamer is male or female. Interpretation of a dream about the news of the death of a close person This dream is considered one of the most difficult things that a sleeper can see in a dream, and it is described as a nightmare and not a dream, especially if the deceased in the dream is a member of the dreamer’s family who fears harm and damage. In the following paragraph, we will explain the most important interpretations of seeing the death of a living relative in a dream: Seeing the death of a father in a dream means that God Almighty will prolong his life and live in good health and happiness by God’s command. Seeing the death of the mother in a dream is evidence that she is a pious and righteous woman who is ready to obey her Lord and seeks good deeds to meet Him with His noble face in His satisfaction with her, Almighty and Majestic. The death of a living brother in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing cooked meat in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cooked meat in a dream or a dream by Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Imam Al-Sadiq via the Roy2a.com vision website. It can indicate goodness or it can be a warning or a warning against the appearance of evil. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of cooked meat, whether it is a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, with different concepts. Great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing cooked meat in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing meat in a dream is a sign that you will obtain a lot of money. Dreaming of eating boiled meat indicates justice and good health. Seeing cooking or boiling meat Meat indicates the fulfillment of dreams, desires, and success in life. If a person sees in his dream that he is cutting meat, this is a sign of the arrival of sustenance and a lot of money. Dreaming of a person who drinks meat broth, it indicates freedom from worries and sorrows and recovery from illness. What about eating human flesh? It indicates To the consumption of prohibited funds. See also: Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream What is the interpretation of cooking meat in a dream for a single woman: Seeing yourself cooking meat in one dream is good news for her that she will marry a good man. Also, the dream of cooking meat for a single woman indicates success in life and the fulfillment of dreams and desires. If she An unmarried girl dreams that she is eating cooked meat. She will get rid of all crises and problems in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing unleavened bread, cheese, meat, or thyme pies in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of eating boiled meat for a single woman: Seeing herself eating boiled meat in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of joy and happiness. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating boiled meat, this is evidence of the arrival of an abundance of food and an abundance of goodness. Cooking meat in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman is seen cooking meat and giving it to her children, it is a sign of the children’s success, superiority, and happiness with her. Dreaming of eating cooked meat in a dream A married woman indicates happiness and stability in her life and the emergence of goodness and livelihood. If a woman sees that she is offering raw meat, this is a reference to zakat and helping the needy. See also: Interpretation of seeing meat fat in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about cooked meat and broth: If one dreams of cooked meat and broth, This is evidence of an improvement in his physical condition and health. Seeing meat and broth in a dream indicates the coming of pleasant events and happy occasions. Dreaming of eating cooked meat and broth with bread also indicates happy news, free occasions and marriages. See also: Interpretation of seeing a leg of lamb or chicken in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing raw meat In a dream: Seeing or buying raw meat indicates goodness and benefit. As for seeing eating bad and weak meat, it indicates that the fortuneteller is suffering from a great loss. Dreaming of obtaining raw meat from an enemy is for the dreamer to hate what happens to the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing a leg of lamb Or chicken in a dream. We are happy to see your dream received about “interpretation of vision

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead gift for a living person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead living gift in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that a dead person gave her a gift and she did not know this person. This indicates that she will enjoy her life. There is an interpretation that says: If an unmarried girl dreams that one of her relatives gave her a gift in a dream And she was happy. This dream indicates that this girl will control all the bad circumstances. Which may pass and soon all her problems will be solved. When an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her deceased father gave her a gift in a dream and she was happy about that. This explains the beautiful life that she will live, And you will be in close contact with someone you love. And live a life full of joy, love and stability. Also, for an unmarried girl to see in a dream that her boyfriend gave her a gift in a dream and it was a pink gift. This indicates that this girl will overcome all the crises in her life. Challenge the difficulties and search for A job opportunity and be successful in it. See also: Interpretation of dreams for a gift from a well-known person. Interpretation of seeing a living dead gift in a dream for a married woman. There is an interpretation that says: If a married woman saw in her dream that her dead brother had given her a beautiful gift and she cried in the dream. This means that this woman misses her brother. And she loves him very much. A married woman sees in a dream that her husband gave her a gift and she was afraid and happy at the same time. This indicates that this woman is just and fears God. But there are those who say that when a married woman sees a gift from a stranger she does not know, and he gives her a gift in a dream, She will be happy. This interpretation shows that this woman will live a life full of joy with her husband and children and that her husband loves and respects her very much. Interpretation of seeing a dead gift in a dream about a man and its meaning If someone sees in his dream that someone gave him a wrapped gift and that man was very happy with this gift This indicates that this man will soon achieve his dreams. He will overcome all the problems that he faces in his life and that affect him. When the man sees in his dream that his dead brother introduced him to him in a dream, and that man cried in the dream. Vidal dreamed of this man who suffers in his life from Circumstances, problems and accumulated debts. But he will realize all his problems in the coming period. Whoever sees in a dream a stranger whom he does not know, he received a gift from him and was delighted and delighted with it. This vision is a sign for this person that he will find a job. It has been established for a long time and is respected and appreciated by employers. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a gift to someone. The meaning of seeing a dead gift in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A pregnant woman saw in her dream that her deceased mother gave her a gift while she was sleeping and the woman was happy with this gift. This means that this woman will give birth soon, and this birth will be easy and simple. And he did not overcome She and the fetus are in good health. There is a vision that says that a pregnant woman who sees in her dream that a strange man gave her a pink gift. This means that the woman will give birth to a beautiful girl, and that her morals and qualities are good. Her upbringing is the best, and she has a good reputation among the people. When the pregnant woman saw that Her deceased relative gave her a special gift, and that was a

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing burning in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Evidence for interpreting the dream of seeing someone burning or burning in a dream through interpretation books for a woman, or a married woman, or a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, or a single woman. Mostly, there is no requirement that the truth be identical in the dream. We may see something good and an interpretation of something good, So we all know that burning is indeed difficult and its pain is difficult and something that one does not like, and our noble Messenger described the sins of burning and that prayer. A cure for burning, that is, cleansing sins. A dream about burns on Ibn Sirin’s face. Interpretation of dreams about burning half or the entire face of Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin. The face is a mirror of the human being and almost all of the body’s senses are present in the face. If one sees in his dream that half of his face has been burned, this means The dreamer has two faces, meaning that he indicates hypocrisy, deception, and gossip, and he has another face in which he represents goodness. And kindness and piety, this vision is a warning to stay away from scandalous behavior and stay away from hypocrisy. A burning face in a dream for a married woman. Ibn Sirin and Imam Nabulsi said in the dream interpretation of burning a woman’s face in a dream. If the dreamer has a beautiful face and is burned, this indicates that this woman has a lot of Of kindness and beauty. But if a woman sees that her face is disfigured in a dream, this is evidence of that. However, this woman has a bad character and does many forbidden things in her life. And if a woman sees in a dream that her face is burning and that there is smoke rising from the face to the sky, this is evidence of many... The misfortunes, anger, and anger that will descend upon that person are from God Almighty, and it indicates that this person is committing many sins and misdeeds in his life. If a woman sees in a dream that her hands are burned, this indicates the clarity of the purpose of this lady and that she supports friends and stands with them. The importance of seeing the effects of burns on the body. A burn in a dream indicates problems, differences, suffering, and tragedy. Whoever dreams of the effects of a burn on his body in a dream shows that he has finished with his problems. It may mean getting out of psychological crises. Evidence of goodness for the better. A return to relief after distress and sadness. Meaning of a dream Burning skin in a dreamDreaming about burning generally in a dream indicates problems and crises. Whoever dreams of a huge, huge fire, but the fire was clean, shows that the dreamer feels sad and is going through a great tragedy in his life, but in the presence of relatives and friends who love him, who are working to solve it. Which. For a woman who dreams that her skin is burning and she feels pain, this is an indication that she is suffering from many problems and intense pressure that she feels in her heart, but she cannot reveal what she feels so that others do not feel it. The meaning of burning fire in dreams. Commentators agreed that seeing fire in a dream indicates the desires and ambitions of the mind that it seeks to achieve, and it will succeed and be very happy. It also indicates good news and joys in the near future. Interpretation of seeing feet burning in a dream. The woman who sees herself appears She walks on her feet and does not feel pain. Insight has a strong personality that depends on

title: Interpretation of feeding birds in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of feeding birds in a dream from Ibn Sirin through this article. God Almighty said: “O leaders, explain to me my vision. If you are a vision that you can explain (43) and we see it in our dreams, I do not understand much of it.. I will necessarily explain it. Only God knows the unseen, then in the encyclopedia we provide interpretations of feeding birds, follow us. Interpretation of feeding birds in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a bird in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing bird feathers in a dream means many blessings and money that enter the dreamer’s life. Dreaming that you are eating delicious bird meat. It symbolizes the promotion that the fortuneteller will receive in his work and that he will receive more halal money. If one sees in a dream that he is swimming with birds. This vision indicates that he will travel and get away from his family and earn a lot of money due to his travels. Seeing someone in a dream throwing stones at birds, especially if they are a type of pigeon. The vision symbolizes his struggle for the honor of women, and another interpretation of this vision is that he is going through a lot of trouble. Seeing a birdcage in a dream is considered one of the praiseworthy visions that warns the dreamer of the coming of abundant goodness, the abundance of food, and the presence of many opportunities from which the fortuneteller will choose the most appropriate for his life. In the case of a vision Bird eggs inside the cage. This vision expresses a doubling of the money that the dreamer will obtain in the coming period. If he sees the presence of a predatory animal inside the bird’s cage. This vision indicates the victory achieved by this person, his victory over his enemies, and the end of all problems and fears in his life. Seeing birds in a dream symbolizes abundant money for the pioneer. If he sees that he has a large number of birds in a dream, then the vision indicates obtaining a lot of money. Money without getting tired. And if he sees his bird running away, this is evidence of the death of his son. Attack of birds in dreams by Imam Ibn Sirin. Seeing birds attacking the dreamer in a dream indicates the weakness of his religion and the weakness of his faith, and that he should approach God Almighty. And in the event that he sees that there are birds Many invade his house. This vision symbolizes the interference of several people in his personal life in the coming period. Which makes him uncomfortable. Interpretation of a dream about feeding birds by Ibn Sirin: If a person sees in a dream that he is feeding birds in a dream and the bird food is above the dreamer’s head and the birds come to his head to eat. This vision expresses the coming death of the dreamer. If the person is sick and sees birds eating worms on the roof of his house. This vision shows his imminent death. If you see someone feeding birds with worms. This vision symbolizes that the dreamer will soon be affected by something bad, and it also symbolizes the presence of many problems in his life. Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: If a person sees in a dream that he is flying with birds and his destination is unknown. This vision reflects his death soon. If he sees that he is singing with the birds. It is an indication of the close relationship that exists between him and his family. A man’s dream of killing birds symbolizes the fulfillment of one of his long-awaited desires. In the event that he sees him eating bird meat. that it
